title: 【通識】轉知~113年全國夏季學院即將開放報名，今年暑假一起來上跨校通識抵學分！
author: 李睿芬
content:
分類： 課程公告
來源： 通識教育中心 - 李睿芬 - fen19@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話03-8906602
對象： 全校職員_全校學生_大一_大二_大三_大四以上
標題： 【通識】轉知~113年全國夏季學院即將開放報名，今年暑假一起來上跨校通識抵學分！
日期： Wed, 24 Apr 2024 16:32:58 +0800
附檔： 113年全國夏季學院課程宣傳海報.jpg (7 MB)   
親愛的同學您好：

113年度全國夏季學院暑期優質通識課程來囉！今年共有56門課程，提供同學暑期進修、跨校交流及通識學分認抵的機會，上課地點遍及全台，暑假返鄉也能就近上課。

您是否已經安排了暑期學習計畫呢？快跟來自不同大專院校的同學們一起加入夏季學院！把握暑假修習通識課程！

★選課時程：
第一階段：113/05/08（三）10:00 至113/05/14（二）23:59
第二階段：113/05/22（三）10:00 至113/05/28（二）23:59
第三階段：113/06/12（三）10:00 至113/06/18（二）23:59
★擁有低收入戶、中低收入戶、清寒證明，且修課成績及格者，將可申請全額退還學分費。 

★113年臺大全國夏季學院課程清單：https://www.n2.org.tw/enter/news/detail/244  
★夏季學院課程資訊：http://www.n2.org.tw/enter/lesson  
★查詢認抵資訊：https://www.n2.org.tw/enter/reconized_list/start
★選課操作影片：https://reurl.cc/xlyjMZ
★全國夏季學院公務信箱：n2summerntu@gmail.com  

全國夏季學院 敬上

2024 Summer College enrollment is about to start. Join us for various courses on general education!

Dear Students,
We are pleased to announce that registration is now open for 2024 Summer College! This summer, we are offering a diverse range of 56 high-quality general education courses, providing you with the opportunity to enhance your studies, engage with students from other universities, and earn transferable credits for general education courses. Do you have any ideas for your summer learning plan already? Hurry up and join the students from different universities in Summer College!

Online enrollment system is open for account registration and course enrollment starting from Wednesday, May 8.

★ Course Enrollment Schedule:

First Phase: May 8, 2024 (Wed) 10:00 to May 14, 2024 (Tue) 23:59
Second Phase: May 22, 2024 (Wed) 10:00 to May 28, 2024 (Tue) 23:59
Third Phase: June 12, 2024 (Wed) 10:00 to June 18, 2024 (Tue) 23:59

★ Students from low-income and middle-low-income households who pass their courses can apply for a full refund of their credit fees.
 
★Course Enrollment Announcement (Undergraduate): https://www.n2.org.tw/enter/news/detail/244
★Course Information of Summer College: http://www.n2.org.tw/enter/lesson
★Credit Recognition Information: https://www.n2.org.tw/enter/reconized_list/start
★Course Selection Tutorial Video: https://reurl.cc/xlyjMZ

Please do not hesitate to contact us, should you have any further queries. Contact Information: Email: n2summerntu@gmail.com

Best regards,
Summer College
